data.title: Short visit before going to the Hospital to see my brother.
data.text: We had BLTs and differing flavors of lattes, etc. The food was no frills but certainly did the job. Everything tasted good and the people were nice. The manager was very inviting and made us feel at home. We came at a slow time and really enjoyed the setting.

data.title: Wonderful coffee experience
data.text: Went here with a group of twenty and was impressed by the staff, their attention to making our dining/snacking experience an absolute delight and their service was speedy.  The coffee was wonderful, far better than the Starbucks and others.   The pastry's were varied and tasty; Sandwiches were prepared fresh and a delight to the pallet.  Not expensive by any stretch of the imagination.  If you are downtown, on courthouse square, and find yourself in need of a coffee, an expresso, cappuccino, a beer, glass of wine, a snack, or a quick meal - you owe it to yourself to try Cup of Everything.  I did and am glad I did.  In a day of hustle and bustle customer service it's nice to find a place where the customer really does matter, you can relax in a quiet atmosphere, and the food is fresh and tasty.  For a quiet get away go upstairs and enjoy the art work on display, and have a quiet moment with your favorite pastry and expresso, a delightful breakfast looking out over the courthouse square, or a quiet, but delightful, lunch.  Need a place for a quick business meeting, try Cup Of Everything you wont be disappointed.

data.title: Quaint Coffeehoue for a impromptu meeting
data.text: Great place to conect with business associates for coffee after work.  It features a larger meeting area upstairs perfect for networking meetings or just enjoying the company of other coffee lovers.

data.title: Mothers  Day Breakfast
data.text: We went for Mothers Day breakfast on Friday 5/6/2016. The place is small there was 1 girl and 1 guy working . It was 9ish we looked over the menu finally the girl came back and got our order. 2 real good cold Heath coffee going to split a BLT when the sandwich came out we kind of looked at each other a little sandwich and a pickle might of been 2 or 3 pieces of bacon chips extra. I ask for another plate or napkin guy gave us 1 napkin when the girl came back since we used the napkin for a plate I ask for another napkin 1 napkin 2 bites later we were  done.$19.00 . Very disappointed.

data.title: Great spot
data.text: I went here with my siblings and cousins and had a great first time experience. There are tons of menu options and something for everyone. The shop was cozy and eclectic but with an old fashioned twist. The staff was pleasant and the coffee drink I ordered was very good. There's a place upstairs to eat and hang out and the wifi signal is pretty strong so it's perfect for getting some work done while sipping your favorite hot or cold beverage. I'll be back again.
